data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mauffray, William F., Tennessen, Kenneth J. (2019): A Catalogue and Historical Study of the Odonata of Ecuador. Zootaxa 4628 (1): 1-265, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4628.1.1|1,266 occurrences
